nestingInherited(default,setNestingInherited) : StyleBlock

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock
Reference to style of which this style is inheriting when the requested property is not in this declaration. The 'nestingInherited' property is a reference to the style of the container in which the IStylable object is placed

parentStyle(default,setParentStyle) : StyleBlock

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock
Parent StyleBlock object. This property is only set if the style only applies to the children of another style. I.e. CSS: .headerBlock DataGrid Button { ... } The parent of Button will be DataGrid style. The parent of DataGrid will be .headerBlock. This property is needed to find the correct inherited styles.

states(getStates,setStates) : StatesStyle

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock

superStyle(default,setSuperStyle) : StyleBlock

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock
Reference to other style-object of whom this style is inheriting when the requested property is not in this declaration. The 'superStyle' property is used to get style-information of a super-class of the described class.

findChild(name : String, childType : StyleBlockType, ?exclude : StyleBlock) : StyleBlock

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock
Method searches for the requested child in it's children. When the child is not found there, it will ask it's parent to look for the requested child.

findState(stateName : Int, styleName : String, styleType : StyleBlockType, ?exclude : StyleBlock, ?depth : Int) : StyleBlock

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock
Method searches for the requested statename in it's children. When the state is not found there, it will ask it's parent to look for the requested state.

inherited from primevc.core.traits.Invalidatable

invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : primevc.core.traits.IInvalidatable) : Void

inherited from primevc.gui.styling.StyleBlock
Method is called when a property in the parent-, super-, extended- or nested-style is changed. If the property is not set in this style-object, it means that the allFilledPropertiesFlag needs to be changed..
